DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study find whether Lactobacillus reuteri prevents antibiotic-associated diarrhea related Clostridium difficile infection . Subjects admit University Hospitals Case Medical Center . They randomly assign intervention group receive L. reuteri placebo . Supplementation occur antibiotic treatment additional 7 day cessation treatment . Data collection occur baseline , end antibiotic use , 7 day antibiotic cessation , 21 day antibiotic cessation . Primary data include diarrhea instance . Secondary data include severity diarrhea , presence C. difficile toxin , presence GI symptom .
